summary.span: 对一组关键帧中具有 的属性的值进行动画处理。

span.span: Animates the value of a property that takes a along a set of key frames.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 关键帧动画的目标值由其 属性定义，该属性包含对象的集合 。A key frame animation's target values are defined by its property, which contains a collection of objects. 每个 定义了一个带有自己的目标和的动画段 。Each defines a segment of the animation with its own target and . 动画运行时，它会在指定的键时间从一个键值前进到下一个键值。When the animation runs, it progresses from one key value to the next at the specified key times. 有三种类型的 类，分别用于每个受支持的内插方法： 、 和 。There are three types of classes, one for each supported interpolation method: , , and . 与不同的 是， 可以有两个以上的目标值。Unlike a , a can have more than two target values. 您还可以控制各个段的内插方法 。You can also control the interpolation method of individual segments.

span.span: KeyFrame Animation Sample

summary.span: 计算一个值，该值表示正进行动画处理的属性的当前值，并由 的实例确定。

span.span: Calculates a value that represents the current value of the property being animated, as determined by this instance of .

returns.span: 计算得出的属性值，该值由当前实例确定。

span.span: The calculated value of the property, as determined by the current instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 `defaultOriginValue` 是组合链中的第一个，则此值将为快照值 (如果有可用) 或基属性值，则该值将是链中前一个动画返回的值 ，它未停止。If `defaultOriginValue` is the first in the composition chain, this value will be the snapshot value (if one is available) or the base property value; otherwise this value will be the value returned by the previous animation in the chain with an that is not stopped. `defaultDestinationValue`如果动画位于属性上动画的第一个组合层中，则为基值; 否则，该值为属性的上一组合动画的输出值。The `defaultDestinationValue` is the base value if the animation is in the first composition layer of animations on a property; otherwise, the value is the output value from the previous composition layer of animations for the property.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示在动画重复时是否累计该动画的值。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the animation's value accumulates when it repeats.

value.span: 如果在动画重复时累计它的值，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the animation accumulates its values when it repeats; otherwise, .
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当此属性设置为时 `true` ，仅当动画的 属性使其重复简单持续时间时，动画的输出值才会累积。When this property is set to `true`, the animation's output values accumulate only when the animation's property causes it to repeat its simple duration. 它在重新启动时不会累积其值，因为它的父级是重复的，或者其时钟是通过调用重新启动的 。It does not accumulate its values when it restarts, because its parent repeated, or because its clock was restarted from a call.
